alert.note: Alert for Dickson; Hickman; Houston; Humphreys; Montgomery; Stewart (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 10:33AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Dickson, Montgomery, Stewart, Houston, Humphreys and northwestern Hickman Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1033 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dover to New Johnsonville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville, Dickson, Waverly, Camden, Dover, Erin, New Johnsonville, McEwen, Tennessee Ridge, Hurricane Mills, Big Rock, Charlotte, Vanleer, Cumberland City, Slayden, Palmyra, Woodlawn, Pinewood, Land Between The Lakes and Houston County Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 153 and 170. Interstate 24 between mile markers 5 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Dickson; Hickman; Houston; Humphreys; Montgomery; Stewart
